answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!If the lab results are normal then in all probability you do not have anemia and diabetes. Please check the results to se if thyroid was tested. Hyopthyroidism often cause fatigue as the presenting symptom.Poor sleep patterns, official worries, problems at home front, stress and depression are the other reasons. Discuss this with your doctor.Hope this helps. Do let me know if there is any thing else and keep me posted. Take care!

question: Hi, I have gone to anual check up physical exam every year. Last in middle of july, my doctor said all results came out ok. But I didn't feel in that way, I fell that one day I feel on and other day I am off. I felt that I was so tired that I am going to die. I don't know what to do with that terrible feeling. It really freaks me out for two months.  What is your suggestions about my symptom?
title: Feeling so tired during daytimes
